arcade.patch.env.component

Class PatchComponentSitesGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.component.PatchComponentSites
      • arcade.patch.env.component.PatchComponentSitesGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchComponentSitesGraphRect, PatchComponentSitesGraphTri

    public abstract class PatchComponentSitesGraph
extends PatchComponentSites
    Extension of PatchComponentSites for graph sites.

    Layout of the underlying graph is specified by GRAPH_LAYOUT. The pattern layout is specified by using "*". The root layout is specified by specifying roots:

    • [<BORDER> random <#>] = random roots with <#> randomly spaced roots, randomly assigned as artery or vein
    • [<BORDER> alternate <#>] = alternating roots with <#> evenly spaced roots, alternating between arteries and veins
    • [<BORDER> single <#><TYPE>] = single <TYPE> root placed a distance <#> percent across the specified border
    • [<BORDER> line <#><TYPE><#>] = line <TYPE> root placed a distance <#> (first number) percent across the specified border that spans a distance <#> (second number) percent across the environment in the direction normal to the specified border

    The border <BORDER> can be LEFT (-x direction), RIGHT (+x direction), TOP (-y direction), or BOTTOM (+y direction). The type <TYPE> can be A / a for an artery or V / v for a vein.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatchComponentSitesGraph

        public PatchComponentSitesGraph(Series series,
                                MiniBox parameters,
                                ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Creates a PatchComponentSites using graph sites.

        Loaded parameters include:

        • GRAPH_LAYOUT = graph layout type
        • OXYGEN_SOLUBILITY_PLASMA = solubility of oxygen in plasma
        • OXYGEN_SOLUBILITY_TISSUE = solubility of oxygen in tissue
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
        parameters - the component parameters dictionary
        random - the random number generator

               int x,
               int y,
               int z)
        Checks if given coordinates are within the environment to add to list.
        Parameters:
        s - the list of valid coordinates
        x - the coordinate in the x direction
        y - the coordinate in the y direction
        z - the coordinate in the z direction

      • complexStep

        void complexStep(ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Graph step that uses traversals to calculate exact hemodynamics.

        Traversing the graph updates the concentrations of molecules in each edge. The amount of concentration added is a function of flow rate and permeability to the given molecule.

        Parameters:
        random - the random number generator

                                                    PatchComponentSitesGraph.SiteNode to)

      • initializeGraph

        Graph initializeGraph(ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Initializes graph for representing sites.

        Calls the correct method to populate the graph with edges (either pattern or root layout). After the graph is defined, the corresponding indices in the lattice adjacent to edges are marked.

        Parameters:
        random - the random number generator
        Returns:
        an initialized graph object

      • makeGraphFactory

        abstract PatchComponentSitesGraphFactory makeGraphFactory(Series series)
        Creates a factory for graphs.
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
        Returns:
        a Graph factory

      • simpleStep

        void simpleStep()
        Graph step that only considers differences in concentration.

        Method is equivalent to the step used with PatchComponentSitesSource and PatchComponentSitesPattern where the amount of concentration added is the difference between the source concentration and the current concentration for a given molecule.

      • stepGraph

        private void stepGraph(java.lang.String code)
        Steps through graph to calculate concentrations and partial pressures.
        Parameters:
        code - the molecule code
